definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: KN-2 is running at circle line of Chi-Chi Town, Nan-Tou County.
sentences.chinese: 滂沱大雨中行駛於集集環鎮鐵路的慶仁2號蒸氣機車。
傍晚時，突然下起滂沱大雨。

sentences.english: The heavy rain made us stray.
sentences.chinese: 滂沱大雨迫使我們繞道而行。

sentences.english: Dakar is most affected, due to the unusually heavy rains.
sentences.chinese: 達喀爾由於異乎尋常的滂沱大雨受影響最嚴重。

sentences.english: Wang Shutong says good - bye come out , meeting torrential heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 王樹彤告辭出來，正遇上滂沱大雨。

sentences.english: We had a heavy rain last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜下了一場滂沱大雨。

sentences.english: The crops were drowned by the heavy rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 莊稼被滂沱大雨浸沒了。

sentences.english: Heavy rain finally saved the day and rid London of its smell.
sentences.chinese: 滂沱大雨挽救了局面，讓倫敦免於臭氣熏天。

sentences.english: Soon it began to rain cats and dogs. Few people were seen on the street.
sentences.chinese: 不久，天下起了滂沱大雨，街上乃至看不到什麼人了。

sentences.english: Ihe rain poured down all day.
The rain poured down all day.
sentences.chinese: 下了一整天的滂沱大雨。

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
Heaven is not cooperating (idiom)/the weather is not favorable for the planned activity
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
